prod_short_desc: Race with Disney•Pixar’s Lightning McQueen for the trophy!
prod_long_desc:
Start your engines and take part in the exciting Florida 500 Final Race from Disney•Pixar Cars 3, featuring an Easy to Build crew chief’s stand with raising red and green race flags and Start/Finish line arch, trackside barriers and a winners’ podium with checkered flags and a trophy. Includes a simple guide to build and play, and bigger pieces help build confidence in younger kids. LEGO® Juniors is an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 4-7. Includes 5 LEGO Juniors characters.
Build an iconic Build an iconic Disney Pixar Cars 3 scene and take part in an exciting race with your favorite characters!
Featuring characters and settings from Disney Pixar Cars 3
Includes Lightning McQueen, Cruz Ramirez, Jackson Storm, Guido and Mack
LEGO Juniors building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Lightning McQueen measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide. Cruz Ramirez measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide. Jackson Storm measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide. Guido measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide. Mack measures over 3” high, 9” long and 1” wide. Crew chief’s stand excluding flags measures over 2” high, 2” wide and 3” long. Start/Finish line arch measures over 4” high, 6” wide and 1” long.
266 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 8
